name: Wormhole! (hostlean)
description:
Disclaimer

This is the first game I've ever made. This game is kind of an experimental approach to portal genre. I have 2 months of experience in coding and unity.  I made this in a week for game jam. It is very short, maybe hard. It has a lot of bugs but manageable.

Controls

A - D : Move        /      Space Bar : Jump

W : Purple Portal 

Left and Right Mouse Buttons: Green Portals

R: Reset Level     /     Esc: Pause Menu

Protip: You can create wormholes in air!
